page.title: 12GOVERNMENT - LOCAL
page.content:
{BEFORE REGIONALISATION 1975} Monifieth had a Town Council with Provost Housing Bailies to Roads Dean of Guild look Health Town Clerk after Sewers Members Finance Law and Order
{AFTER REGIONALISATION 1975} Tayside Regional Council 1 Regional Councillor City of Dundee District Council 2 District Councillors to represent Monifieth People --------- The Community Council meets once a month.Its purpose is to ensure adequate representation and encourage public participation in the responsibilities of local government.
